byline.original: Correspondence of the New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: What shall I say of the good city of Boston, in these times of parade and excitement? If I undertake to write the facts, the movements of the honored ones, or the hundred incidents of the occasion, the winged lightning has anticipated me, and when the Express hands you my sheet, 'tis but a record of things that were.
